name: Cryo Hypostasis
title: Cryo Hypostasis
desc: Code name: Daleth. A high-purity Cryo entity.\nIt doesn't seem all that good at ball sports...

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Cryo Hypostasis

skills.name: Ice Ring Waltz
skills.desc: Deals 3 Cryo DMG. This character gains Overwhelming Ice.

skills.name: Plunging Ice Shards
skills.desc: Deals 2 Cryo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 Piercing Iceridge.

skills.name: Cryo Crystal Core
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Cryo Crystal Core.

skills.name: Elemental Sedimentation: Cryo
skills.desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains Elemental Lifeform: Cryo.
